At RHS our stated vision includes "a future life of leadership and service." It's no surprise that many Argonauts are already leading that "future life!" Just a few days ago, founding scholar Angel Akinleye gave the opening remarks at the Earth Charter Indiana Climate Leadership Summit AND worked with other students, middle school through college, on an important presentation to First Responders.
Angel takes environmental justice seriously. '"I used to wake up with a fear of the future. What will life look like in 2050? ... I now wake up and think, “what will I do today to make tomorrow better?”' We're so excited to see where the future takes Angel and her fellow students! #GoArgonauts ⚓️
You can see the RHS Mission, Vision, & Core Values on our website. You can read Angel's entire opening address here: https://www.earthcharterindiana.org/youth-power-indiana/welcome-remarks-for-climate-leadership-summit-5-aug-27-2020

At ICS, we believe every student is a scholar, we engage in an urban community, we advance timeless ideas and content, we build a culture of respect and trust through relationships with people and ideas, and we serve as a catalyst for renewal. These are our core values.
“What I try to tell young people is that if you come together with a mission, and it’s grounded with love and a sense of community, you can make the impossible possible.“
Rep. Thank you, Rep. Lewis, for sharing your important lessons with us.
